description.czech: Zabij ponurého havrana v bláznově sadě (boty, hruď, klobouk a rukavice)
description.danish: Dræb Grim Raven iført narrens sæt (støvler, bryst, hat og handsker)
description.dutch: Dood de Grim Raven met de fool's set aan (laarzen, borst, hoed en handschoenen)
description.english: Kill the Grim Raven wearing the fool's set (boots, chest, hat and gloves)
description.finnish: Tapa Grim Raven narrin setti päällä (saappaat, rinta, hattu ja hanskat)
description.french: Tuez le Corbeau Grim portant l'ensemble du fou (bottes, coffre, chapeau et gants)
description.german: Töte den grimmigen Raben, der das Narrenset trägt (Stiefel, Brust, Hut und Handschuhe)
description.hungarian: Öld meg a Grim Raven-t a bolond szettben (csizma, mellkas, sapka és kesztyű)
description.indonesian: Bunuh Grim Raven dengan mengenakan set bodoh (sepatu bot, dada, topi, dan sarung tangan)
description.italian: Uccidi il corvo truce indossando il set del folle (stivali, petto, cappello e guanti)
description.japanese: 愚者のセット (ブーツ、チェスト、帽子、手袋) を身に着けたグリム レイヴンを倒す
description.koreana: 바보의 세트(부츠, 가슴, 모자, 장갑)를 착용하고 그림 레이븐 처치
description.norwegian: Drep Grim Raven iført narresettet (støvler, bryst, lue og hansker)
description.polish: Öld meg a Grim Raven-t a bolond szettben (csizma, mellkas, sapka és kesztyű)
description.portuguese: Mata o Grim Raven usando o conjunto do tolo (botas, peito, chapéu e luvas)
description.russian: Убейте мрачного ворона, надев комплект дурака (сапоги, нагрудник, шляпа и перчатки)
description.schinese: 穿着愚人套装（靴子、胸甲、帽子和手套）杀死冷酷的乌鸦
description.spanish: Mata al Cuervo Siniestro usando el conjunto del tonto (botas, pechera, sombrero y guantes)
description.swedish: Döda Grim Raven iförd fool's set (stövlar, bröst, hatt och handskar)
description.tchinese: 穿著傻瓜套裝（靴子、胸部、帽子和手套）殺死冷酷烏鴉
description.thai: ฆ่า Grim Raven โดยสวมชุดของคนโง่ (รองเท้า, หน้าอก, หมวก และถุงมือ)

description.ukrainian: Убийте Похмурого Ворона, одягнувши комплект дурня (чоботи, скриня, капелюх і рукавички)
